review: Loving it everyday!! I don't know why I waited so long! It was super easy to set up! And I am NOT a tech person what so ever!!
author: Moozsky

review: use this almost everyday. turns every tv into a smartTV. Better than chromecast due to the fact that you dont have to cast from another device and everything is on stick.
author: Carrie

review: Easy to setup and works great. Took less than 10 minutes to get Netflix and Amazon prime running.
author: Lauri

review: I have streaming through my blu-ray player, but it drops wireless connection often. The Fire Stick is amazing. Easy setup, remote app for mobile devices, smooth streaming, quick movie startup, and does not drop signal. I'm very pleased with this purchase.
author: Helena

review: Easy to follow directions . We had it working in just a few minutes.
author: Kindle Customer
